item.title: Social media manager - Upwork
item.description:
Job Opportunity: Social Media and Content Manager for Wedding Cinematography Company

We are looking for a talented and creative Social Media and Content Manager to join our team, a premier wedding cinematography company. Our mission is to capture the most significant moments of a couple's big day, and we need your expertise to showcase these beautiful stories through compelling content on our social media platforms.

Role Overview:
As our Social Media and Content Manager, you will be responsible for creating, curating, and managing content across our social platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, and others. Your main tasks will include uploading two projects per month, crafting engaging stories, reels, and posts leading up to the release of a wedding trailer, and occasionally stepping in as a content creator to produce original videos and graphics.

Responsibilities:

Develop and implement a cohesive social media strategy to increase brand visibility and engagement.
Schedule and oversee the posting of edited videos, behind-the-scenes content, and other engaging media.
Create original content such as reels and stories to enhance our audience interaction and brand presence.
Utilise Facebook marketing tools to maximise post reach and engagement.
Craft compelling captions and select appealing visuals that align with our brand’s aesthetic.
Analyse performance metrics to optimise content strategy and report on social media progress.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a social media manager and content creator, especially in environments focused on visual storytelling.
Strong understanding of Facebook marketing and advertising strategies.
Excellent communication, copywriting, and video editing skills.
Ability to analyse engagement data and adapt content strategies accordingly.
A keen eye for detail.

What We Offer:

The opportunity to work with a passionate team that values creativity and innovation.
The chance to tell love stories and shape public perceptions with your content.
Competitive compensation and flexible working conditions.
If you are a creative professional with a knack for social media and storytelling. Help us create and share unforgettable moments!


Posted On: June 24, 2024 13:05 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Fashion & Beauty, Facebook Ads Manager, Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Instagram Story, Facebook, SEO Backlinking
Skills: Fashion & Beauty, Facebook Ads Manager, Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Instagram Story, Facebook, SEO Backlinking
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor for Faceless Luxury Channel ($7 PER MINUTE) - Upwork
item.description:
*NO AGENCIES, ONLY SOLO FREELANCERS!*

My team is looking for 3-5 talented video editors for our faceless channel about luxury and wealth.

You must be able to EASILY replicate/do better than this editing style: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RyMkFnIMlwE

Average video length will be 20-25 minutes. We need 1-2 videos delivered per week.

Pay rate is $7 per minute of video length. Average pay per video ends up at $140-$200.

All applicants are required to complete a 1-2 minute test sample in order to have a chance for the position.

About us: We are a youtube media company that have been running a dozen faceless youtube channels for the last 3+ years and have spent well over 6 figures on Upwork. We are looking for capable and ambitious people to add to our team so we can continue to grow!


Budget: $200
Posted On: June 24, 2024 12:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Videography, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Videography, Adobe Photoshop
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Create a Ceramic coating ad video - Upwork
item.description:
### **Revolutionary Ceramic Coating: The Ultimate Shield for Your Vehicle**

**[Opening Scene: Dramatic music with a sleek car driving through different environments - city streets, rain, mud, and off-road terrains. Close-up shots of water beading off the car's surface.]**

**Narrator:**
"Your car isn't just a mode of transport; it's a statement, an investment, and a source of pride. But every journey, every mile exposes it to elements that can dull its shine and compromise its beauty. Introducing our revolutionary Ceramic Coating – the ultimate shield for your vehicle."

**[Cut to: High-energy montage of the product application process. A professional detailer carefully applies the ceramic coating to the car's exterior.]**

**Narrator:**
"Our advanced ceramic coating is more than just a protective layer. It’s a cutting-edge formula designed to bond at a molecular level with your car’s paintwork, creating a durable, hydrophobic surface that resists the harshest elements."

**[Scene Transition: Microscopic animation showing the coating bonding with the car's surface, forming a protective barrier.]**

**Narrator:**
"Unlike traditional waxes or sealants, our ceramic coating forms a semi-permanent, transparent layer that can withstand extreme temperatures, UV rays, acid rain, bird droppings, tree sap, and road grime. It’s a shield that not only protects but also enhances the aesthetic appeal of your vehicle."

**[Cut to: A split-screen comparison of two cars – one with and one without the ceramic coating. The coated car remains pristine, while the uncoated one shows signs of damage and dirt.]**

**Narrator:**
"See the difference for yourself. On one side, a car without our ceramic coating, vulnerable to scratches, stains, and fading. On the other, a car treated with our ceramic coating – flawless, glossy, and immaculate."

**[Scene Transition: Slow-motion footage of water, mud, and dirt sliding off the coated car surface.]**

**Narrator:**
"The hydrophobic properties of our ceramic coating mean that water, mud, and dirt can’t cling to the surface. Cleaning your car becomes effortless. A quick rinse, and it looks like it just rolled out of the showroom."

**[Cut to: Customer testimonials. Real users sharing their experiences and satisfaction.]**

**Customer 1:**
"I was skeptical at first, but after applying the ceramic coating, my car looks amazing. It’s been months, and the shine is just as brilliant as day one."

**Customer 2:**
"Living in an area with unpredictable weather, I needed something reliable. This ceramic coating exceeded my expectations. My car is protected, and I spend way less time cleaning it."

**[Scene Transition: Professional car detailer demonstrating the ease of application.]**

**Detailer:**
"Application is straightforward. Just ensure the surface is clean and dry, apply the coating with a microfiber cloth, and let it cure. The results are instant and remarkable."

**[Cut to: Time-lapse of a car being coated and the final reveal – a pristine, ultra-glossy vehicle.]**

**Narrator:**
"Our ceramic coating isn’t just for new cars. It rejuvenates older vehicles, restoring their luster and protecting them from further wear and tear. It’s like giving your car a second skin."

**[Scene Transition: Highlighting additional benefits - increased resale value, long-lasting protection, and enhanced color depth.]**

**Narrator:**
"Not only does our ceramic coating protect and beautify, but it also increases your car’s resale value. The durable protection can last for years, maintaining the car’s condition and ensuring it looks its best. Plus, the enhanced color depth and clarity make your car’s paintwork truly stand out."

**[Cut to: A family enjoying a road trip in their shiny, coated car.]**

**Narrator:**
"Imagine hitting the road with confidence, knowing your vehicle is safeguarded against whatever nature throws at it. Our ceramic coating is the peace of mind you need, allowing you to enjoy the journey without worrying about your car’s appearance."

**[Scene Transition: Close-up of the product packaging and application tools.]**

**Narrator:**
"Each ceramic coating kit includes everything you need for a professional-grade application: the ceramic coating solution, microfiber cloths, and detailed instructions. It’s designed for both car enthusiasts and professionals."

**[Cut to: The final message with the product logo and contact information.]**

**Narrator:**
"Don’t let the elements take a toll on your pride and joy. Protect your investment with our revolutionary Ceramic Coating. Unmatched protection, unbeatable shine – it’s more than a coating; it’s a revolution in car care."

**[End with: A call to action. The screen shows the product website, phone number, and social media handles.]**

**Narrator:**
"Visit our website today to learn more and order your ceramic coating kit. Follow us on social media for tips, customer stories, and special offers. Shield your car with the best – because your vehicle deserves nothing less."

**[Closing Scene: The car drives off into the sunset, gleaming under the light, as the brand logo appears on the screen.]**

---

### **Key Highlights of the Ceramic Coating:**

1. **Advanced Protection:**
   - Bonds at a molecular level for maximum durability.
   - Resistant to UV rays, acid rain, bird droppings, and road grime.

2. **Hydrophobic Properties:**
   - Repels water, mud, and dirt.
   - Makes cleaning effortless and reduces maintenance time.

3. **Aesthetic Enhancement:**
   - Provides a high-gloss finish.
   - Enhances color depth and clarity.
   - Restores and rejuvenates older paintwork.

4. **Easy Application:**
   - Simple, straightforward process.
   - Suitable for both professionals and car enthusiasts.

5. **Long-lasting Results:**
   - Offers protection that lasts for years.
   - Increases the resale value of your vehicle.

### **Customer Testimonials:**

- **Satisfied User:** "I applied the ceramic coating myself, and the results are phenomenal. My car looks like it’s been detailed by a professional."
- **Happy Family:** "With this coating, our road trips are more enjoyable. No more worrying about dirt and grime. A quick rinse, and our car is spotless."

### **Call to Action:**

- **Order Now:** Visit our website for more information and to purchase your ceramic coating kit.
- **Stay Connected:** Follow us on social media for the latest updates, tips, and exclusive offers.

---

This script aims to highlight the key features and benefits of the ceramic coating, making it appealing to both potential customers and video editors looking to create an engaging ad. The narrative flow, combined with visuals and testimonials, is designed to capture attention and persuade viewers of the product’s value.

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 24, 2024 13:03 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Help us make GIFs for Facebook Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are a digital media and games company. On a daily basis, we reach millions of users with our content, projects and games, such as the Nametests Instant Game on Facebook. We are a creative team pursuing our mission to 'make people smile'; we are committed to entertaining people and aim to inspire their world!

We use the latest technology in order to be highly adaptive. Combined with our agile spirit and great teamwork, this allows us to achieve:

More than 500 million people who played our games
More than 120 million fans on Facebook
Content and minigames translated into more than 40 different languages
The social sweethearts are looking for passionate and dynamic colleagues who would like to join us in continuing to create a more colourful world.


We are looking for a person to create GIFs for our Facebook Ads, and eventually short videos.

Show the transformation of a user profile picture into an AI image as a GIF! We are looking forward to hearing from you :)

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 24, 2024 12:52 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Social Media Imagery, GIF Based on Image or Video, Video Editing, Facebook Advertising
Skills: Social Media Imagery, GIF Based on Image or Video, Video Editing, Facebook Advertising
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Video record walking around inside Costco - Upwork
item.description:
Video record walking around inside a Costco store. It should be similar to this video: https://youtu.be/aBynjSu8In8?si=5DllKCH0inxXk15H

It should not be too busy inside the store (so recommend doing this on a Mon, Tues, Wed when store first opens).

Video-recording must meet following criteria:
1) Excellent stabilization
2) 4K at 60 fps
3) Video-Record in horizontal orientation
4) No video stuttering, ghosting (common if you use older gopro models; GoPro Hero12 works fine)
5) Last 10 minutes total

No talking, editing, or background music. I need just the video!

Thank you for your consideration.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 24, 2024 12:55 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Production, Videography
Skills: Video Production, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Howto video editing - Upwork
item.description:
We need several professional videos to explain things to the customer.

The video should be on our homepage and YouTube etc. The videos should not be recognized as shorts.

The videos are short, 1-2 minutes.

Each video has a short introduction and a license and copyright-free, unobtrusive background music.

You will receive video recordings that may need to be optimized.

The description of what needs to be done should be displayed in the lower part of the video.
The background should be black and the text white.

Video 1: Installing a roller shutter control
Video 2: Setting up Google Assistant
Video 3: Setting up Alexa
Video 4: Teaching a radio transmitter to the door control

The job is done, when we are happy with the videos.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 24, 2024 12:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Micd up basketball video - Upwork
item.description:

item.title: Video Editor | LONG TERM | Old Entertainment - History | Youtube Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Take a look at this video, note the editing details throughout.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ftz-_XaYtaQ

Are you able to edit a video like this?

The goal is to edit 4 weekly videos of 30 minutes each, at least.
The price per edited minute is $1. Weekly Total 120$. Monthly equals 480$.
The editing of each video must be ready in 2 days.

***[IMPORTANT] Your offer WON'T be read if you do not attach previous video editing work.

If you feel confident to do this style of editing, send me a message to start today.

Budget: $480
Posted On: June 24, 2024 12:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Final Cut Pro
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Final Cut Pro
Country: Spain
